short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the latest supporter notification on top of the screen on Newgrounds.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When the site loads, it will remove the "Newest Supporter Notification" at the top

Report bugs at https://xytriza.com/ng-supporter-notification-remover/bugs
